entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -40.9°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
